article:
=== Dependency Injection with Java and JSR-330 - Tutorial
Lars Vogel
2010 vogella GmbH
14.01.2010
Version 0.1
=== Dependency injection (DI) in Java with javax.inject This article describes how to use dependency injection with Java and the JSR-330. It first describes dependency injection as a general principle and then explains how to use dependency injection in Java application based javax.inject.
